content: in a court case a judgment was made in a divorce case between two parties referred to as l and g the main issue was the division of their property specifically an apartment g was ordered to pay compensation of eur 20000 to l for the loss of ownership g must also change the title of the property to l as the sole owner the costs of the proceedings will be shared between the parties with l being refunded half of the fee paid the court mentioned the right to appeal the judgment the marriage will officially end when the judgment comes into force

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
